text: [Static Town, Territory of Static]
Proton: Everyone, I have talked with the kingand he has provided us a ship.
Proton: We will set sail as soon as everyone is ready.
[Static Town Port, Territory of Static]
???: Hello, are you Proton Xurr?
Proton: I am.
???: I am Fael Illyure of the ElementalOffense Squad.
???: And I am Erif Blaze of the ElementalOffense Squad.
Erif: We have been assigned to assist you onyour voyage to the Nolavillian Continent.
Erif: However, due to another assignment going on,only one of us can help you.
[Q] Recruit Fael[W] Recruit Erif[E] Don't recruit either
Fael: Bruh.
???: DID SOMEBODY SAY "BRUH"!?
???: Bruh-huh!
???: I am the great Vruh E. Momen LXIX!
Vruh: I search the world for epic "BruhMoments", and your sir... have just said"Bruh"!
Vruh: Such wholesomeness! Such gaming!
Vruh: Such... D R I P
Vruh: This is truly poggers!
Vruh: Oh what an adventure this will be!
[Q] You're hired[W] We never recruited you
Vruh: Oh, so that's how it is...
Vruh: You shall repent in the fires of the Xuir Wrathfor all of eternity, with no hope of ever escapingto freedom, for you have disturbed the way of the Bruh.
Vruh: I wait for the day in which I may witness youruntimely gameend so in which I could perform the danceof the defaults upon your soulless husk of a body.
Vruh: /s
Proton: ...
